body: Yeah comments in commit messages are nice, but that shouldn't mean you don't put them in the code. I never check the commit messages when reading the code, since there are often tens of commits that touch a single file.
body_html: Yeah comments in commit messages are nice, but that shouldn't mean you don't put them in the code. I never check the commit messages when reading the code, since there are often tens of commits that touch a single file.
body_text: Yeah comments in commit messages are nice, but that shouldn't mean you don't put them in the code. I never check the commit messages when reading the code, since there are often tens of commits that touch a single file.
